weekly_top_story.headline: Israel Conducts Deadly Airstrike on Hamas Leaders in Doha Amid Ceasefire Talks
weekly_top_story.summary: Israel launched a lethal airstrike targeting senior Hamas leaders in Doha, Qatar, where ceasefire negotiations were underway, significantly impacting Middle East diplomacy and US-Israel relations.

stories.headline: Russia Holds Major 'Zapad' War Games in Belarus Amid NATO Tensions
stories.summary: Russia commenced large-scale military exercises 'Zapad' in Belarus, raising geopolitical tensions with NATO and signaling continued military posturing in Eastern Europe.

stories.headline: UK Drops Charges Against Two Men Accused of Spying for China
stories.summary: British authorities have dropped spying charges against two men accused of acting on behalf of China, highlighting ongoing espionage concerns and diplomatic sensitivities.

stories.headline: North Korean Defector Kim Seong-Min Dies, Known for Broadcasting Truth to North Korea
stories.summary: Renowned North Korean defector Kim Seong-Min, who played a key role in informing North Koreans via radio broadcasts, USB sticks, and networks, has passed away, marking the loss of a key voice against the regime.
